caseStudies.contenu:
The TOP PASTRY CHEF challenge makes Saint-Avé shine during a recruitment campaign on social media.

 

Intended for pastry enthusiasts, the competition consisted of reproducing each week, for 8 weeks, a pastry recipe based on Saint-Avé margarine. Participants then had to submit photos of their creations to the votes of internet users on Facebook. 7 winners were qualified for the grand finale and each won a pastry equipment.

The grand winner elected 'TOP PASTRY CHEF Saint-Avé 2020' won a week of pastry training and a complete kitchen equipment kit.

123 Participants

57.853 Voters

+14 567 new subscribers recruited

665 121 people reached by publications

127 551 interactions with publications

19.2% engagement rate

SOLIBRA, the leading brewer in Côte d'Ivoire, launches SoCITY, a 100% free app that puts Abidjan in your pocket!

In the midst of an ultra-competitive market, SOLIBRA had to find a way to support its modern brand image, better understand its consumers' habits, and strengthen its relationship with its network of partners.

To help SOLIBRA achieve these goals, we imagined and developed the SoCITY app. The pioneering app offers a geolocated directory of Abidjan's must-see addresses. The establishments that are registered can feed their own content and offer deals, promotions or communicate on their events. Users receive notifications directly from the brand and its partners.

Website

Big Five conçoit un site web de livraison d'eau minérale et d'huile d'olive à domicile pour le Groupe des Boissons du Maroc.

Le Groupe des Boissons du Maroc propose la livraison à domicile et par abonnement de son emblématique eau minérale Aïn Ifrane, mais également d’autres marques d’eaux et d’huiles d’olive.

Dans ce contexte, Big Five a créé un site e-commerce visant à simplifier et à personnaliser la livraison à domicile pour les consommateurs. Le site permet notamment de programmer les livraisons et d’en définir la fréquence.

www.ainifranchezvous.ma

The Lyon-based start-up of thermoformable shin guards offers an e-commerce showcase.

Virtus Football, a French manufacturer of innovative sports equipment, entrusted Big Five with the task of creating an e-commerce site aimed at promoting its flagship product: Virtus SymbioFIT®.

Big Five has therefore created a website with a clear and graphical design, inspired by the playful and vintage aspect of our childhood football album stickers. A way to highlight the known and recognized users that this custom product is starting to collect.

www.virtusfootball.com
